query:
ALTER TABLE domain_orders 
ADD COLUMN dnsStatus ENUM('pending', 'configuring', 'propagating', 'active', 'error') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN sslStatus ENUM('pending', 'provisioning', 'active', 'error') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN cloudflareZoneId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN cloudflareCnameRecordId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN nameservers TEXT,
ADD COLUMN targetHost VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'lulubaby.manus.space',
ADD COLUMN lastDnsCheck TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN lastSslCheck TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN dnsErrorMessage TEXT,
ADD COLUMN sslErrorMessage TEXT;

ADD COLUMN sslStatus ENUM('pending', 'provisioning', 'active', 'error') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN cloudflareZoneId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN cloudflareCnameRecordId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN nameservers TEXT,
